title: [feature request]: Search using regexp support using "filter search"
author: nmat
body_snippet:
In searching for connection be able to use regexp to search.

## Expected Behavior
Searching using regexp like: *-test-*

Should show servers and connections that has any information for -test- in them.

## Current Behavior
Nothing is matched.

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)

1. In Tools -> Options -> Connections. Set "Filter search matches in connection tree" 
2. Have servers using specific names
3. Search using regexp in connection dialog

## Context
Smarter search to filter...
